companyName.description: The company name displayed on the invoice

street.description: Company address. 1 or 2 lines separated by a new line character

countryCode.description: A two-letter ISO code of the country

stateOrProvinceCode.description: State code (e.g. NY) or a region name

currency.description: 3-letters code of the store currency (ISO 4217). Examples: USD, CAD

currencyPrecision.description: Numbers of digits after decimal point in the store prices. E.g. 2 ($2.99) or 0 (Â¥500).

currencyGroupSeparator.description: Price thousands separator. Supported values: space , dot ., comma , or empty value.

currencyDecimalSeparator.description: Price decimal separator. Possible values: . or ,

currencyTruncateZeroFractional.description: Hide zero fractional part of the prices in storefront. true or false .

currencyRate.description: Currency rate in U.S. dollars, as set in the merchant control panel

weightUnit.description: Weight unit. Supported values: CARAT, GRAM, OUNCE, POUND, KILOGRAM

weightPrecision.description: Numbers of digits after decimal point in weights displayed in the store

weightGroupSeparator.description: Weight thousands separator. Supported values: space , dot ., comma , or empty value

weightDecimalSeparator.description: Weight decimal separator. Possible values: . or ,

weightTruncateZeroFractional.description: Hide zero fractional part of the weight values in storefront. true or false .

dateFormat.description: Date format, e.g. MMM d, yyyy

orderNumberPrefix.description: Order number prefix in a store

orderNumberSuffix.description: Order number suffix in a store

facebookPreferredLocale.description: Language automatically chosen be default in Facebook storefront (if any)

automaticTaxEnabled.description: true if taxes are calculated automatically, else otherwise

taxes.description: Manual tax settings for a store

id.description: Unique internal ID of the tax

enabled.description: Whether tax is enabled true / false

includeInPrice.description: true if the tax rate is included in product prices.

useShippingAddress.description: true if the tax is calculated based on shipping address, false if billing address is used

taxShipping.description: true is the tax applies to subtotal+shipping cost . false if the tax is applied to subtotal only

appliedByDefault.description: true if the tax is applied to all products. false is the tax is only applied to thos product that have this tax enabled

defaultTax.description: Tax value, in %, when none of the destination zones match

tax.description: Tax rate for this zone in %
